head.title: Create and Integrate Custom Stamps into {{FileFormatUp}} Using {{ProgLang}}
head.description: Harness the power of {{ProgLang}} and {{ProdShortName}} to generate and embed personalized stamps across all pages of {{FileFormatUp}} files.

header.title: Incorporate Dynamic Stamps into {{FileFormatUp}} Files with {{ProgLang}}
header.description: Seamlessly integrate custom-designed stamps into any section of your documents using {{ProdFullName}}, offering extensive flexibility for stamp placement and configuration to meet your business needs.
header.subtitle: {{ProdFullName}}

about.title: Overview of {{ProdFullName}}
about.content: [{{ProdFullName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) is a versatile tool that enables the insertion of multiple signature types into documents, including customizable stamps. Supporting over 60 file formats, from PDFs and Word documents to images and ZIP files, you can enrich your documents with text, image, barcode, metadata, digital certificates, and stamps. Furthermore, you have full control to search, validate, modify, or remove any signatures applied to your files.

more_features.title: Leverage Signatures to Secure and Enhance Document Integrity
more_features.description: With the {{ProdFullName}} library, you can seamlessly integrate signature functionality into your documents. Easily add, modify, verify, or remove custom stamps and other signature types, offering flexibility and precision for secure document management.

feature_1.title: Comprehensive Document Signing
feature_1.content: Enhance your documents by placing signatures, including text, images, barcodes, QR codes, and stamps, at any position or page within the file. Additionally, manage embedded metadata and apply digital certificates to safeguard against unauthorized changes.

feature_2.title: Efficient Signature Search and Validation
feature_2.content: After signing, verify the authenticity and integrity of document signatures. Utilize advanced search functionality to retrieve and manage all signature data embedded in the document.

feature_3.title: Modify and Customize Signatures
feature_3.content: Adjust previously inserted signatures with ease. Whether you need to change the content, position, size, or color, our solution offers full flexibility for signature modification.

feature_4.title: Effortlessly Remove Signatures
feature_4.content: When signatures need to be removed, {{ProdFullName}} provides a complete set of tools to delete any type of signature, including stamps, digital certificates, and more, ensuring that your documents remain up-to-date and compliant.

formats.title: Apply Stamps Across Various Document Formats
formats.description: The {{ProdShortName}} API allows you to embed stamps across more than 60 industry-standard file types. Effortlessly apply custom stamps to any location within your documents, enabling enhanced document tracking and personalization.

operations.title: Explore Core Functionalities
operations.description: Discover a broad range of options to create, manage, and delete various types of signatures, ensuring comprehensive control over your document workflows.

examples.comment_2: Initialize {{StampSignOptions}} with the required signature content
examples.comment_3: Incorporate one or multiple stamp lines

steps.title: Procedure for Embedding Stamp Signatures into {{FileFormatUp}} Documents using {{ProgLang}}

content.title: [{{ProdShortName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) offers a robust stamp creation feature, ideal for enhancing {{EnvName}} applications. Leverage this tool to design and implement highly customized stamps on your document pages.
content.step_1: Provide the {{FileFormatUp}} document to be stamped.
content.step_2: Utilize {{StampSignOptions}} to meticulously configure all requisite parameters.
content.step_3: Add multiple stamp lines as per your requirements.
content.step_4: Apply the configured stamp and save the modified document.
